amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Farm Service Agency, the Natural Resources Conservation Service, and Rural Development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Farm Service Agency, Salaries and Expenses by $52,873,606, to increase funding for the Natural Resources Conservation Serivce, Conservation Operations by $40,458,661 and to increase funding for Rural Development, Salaries and Expenses by $27,624,733.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonilla amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Bonilla.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonilla amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
